entry.title: $2567 // GREAT LOOKING 1 BEDROOM APT WITH W/D, NEW APPLIANCES, GOOD AREA.
entry.content:
**Landlord is offering 1-Month Free Rent. Advertised Rent is Net Effective on a 12-month lease with the LAST MONTH RENT FREE. Gross Rent $2,800 to be paid monthly.**
---
Don't miss this renovated 1-Bedroom / 1-Bathroom home on the Upper West Side.
---
Apartment Features:
- Whole building and unit has been recently renovated
- Stainless steel appliances and stone counter-tops
- In-Unit Bosch washer and dryer
- Queen Size bedroom with closet and windows
- Wide-planked hardwood flooring throughout
- USB wall outlets
- Heat & Water Included
- Available for IMMEDIATE move-in
- Pet's accepted 25-pounds and below, $250 pet-deposit
----
*Photos of actual unit
--- 0135
You must be present for a lease signing if you are going to apply there are no remote signings no exceptions

entry.title: $2550 // Large*Gut Renovated*Bright*Prime Loc
entry.content:
Here for rent is a Large one bedroom in the Prime Upper West Side. This apartment is newly renovated with new appliances and kitchen cabinets, new flooring and windows and new bathroom. The apartment has great ceiling height and large windows giving it a great open feel. This unit is located on 76th street not too far from the express 2 and 3 trains. The natural lighting makes this place a great joy. The living room is also massive and there is great closet space.

Contact me asap to schedule a viewing.
